newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Siddons says profits ahead of 95/96.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Siddons says profits ahead of 95/96.

text.p: Light engineering and hardware group Siddons Ramset Ltd said on Monday that its sales and profits in the early part of the 1996/97 year to June 30 were ahead of the comparable figures for 1995/96.
On September 2, the company reported an 11.8 percent rise in net profit for the year to June 30 to A$19.35 million, struck on an 11.4 percent rise in sales to A$269.19 million.

In its annual report for the year to June 30, Siddons Ramset said that while Australian economic growth had slowed, it expected some improvement in the sectors in which the company operated towards the end of the financial year.
By 11.30 a.m. (0130 GMT), Siddons Ramset shares were untraded but bid at A$4.15, down A$1.35 on the last trade on September 27. The stock is tightly held and illiquid.
